entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this morning. Showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High 14. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low 8.
